nodes.text: These quarters were used by the governor of the planet Bandomeer. It was located within Bandor. The quarters featured a receiving room and guest quarters. In 44 BBY, when Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn arrived on Bandomeer in response to a request from the Bandomeer government asking for a "Guardian of the Peace", he was housed in one of the quarters' guest chamber, along with Obi-Wan Kenobi.
